mapper.insert: insert into article (art_id, class_id, art_user_id, art_title, art_img, art_vedio, cime, `status`, `label`, art_content) values (#{artId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{artUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{artTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{artImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{artVedio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{artContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update article set class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, art_user_id = #{artUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, art_title = #{artTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, art_img = #{artImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, art_vedio = #{artVedio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cime = #{cime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `label` = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, art_content = #{artContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where art_id = #{artId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select art_id, class_id, art_user_id, art_title, art_img, art_vedio, cime, `status`, `label`, art_content from article where art_id = #{artId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select art_id, class_id, art_user_id, art_title, art_img, art_vedio, cime, `status`, `label`, art_content from article
